title: Understanding Column Width
text: Column width in Excel can be adjusted to fit the content within the cells. This ensures that all data is visible and properly aligned.

title: Manual Adjustment
text: You can manually adjust the column width by dragging the boundary on the right side of the column heading until the column is the width you want.

title: AutoFit Column Width
text: Excel provides an option to automatically adjust the column width to fit the content. This is known as 'AutoFit'.

hintAnswer: set the width manually or allow Excel to size the column to best fit
title: Choosing the Correct Method
text: Which of the following methods can be used to change the column width in Excel?
choices: set the width manually or allow Excel to size the column to best fit
